statements: ALTER TABLE compliance_regulations ADD COLUMN date_issued DATE;
ALTER TABLE compliance_records ADD COLUMN compliance_status STRING;
ALTER TABLE compliance_records MODIFY COLUMN document TEXT;
ALTER TABLE compliance_regulations ADD COLUMN regulation_country VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
ALTER TABLE compliance_documents ADD COLUMN document_type VARCHAR(50)
ALTER TABLE compliance_issues ADD COLUMN issue_status VARCHAR(20)
ALTER TABLE audit_logs ADD COLUMN IP_ADDRESS TEXT;
ALTER TABLE user_profiles ADD COLUMN address TEXT;
ALTER TABLE compliance_policies ADD COLUMN status TEXT;
